name: Blind Dirting
description:
Have you ever taken a walk in a park and wondered what it would be like to be a pigworm dating Trees? No? Well next time you will!  Or just play this Dating Sim to find out right now.

A new Dating Sim!

Valentine's Day is coming up, and Piggles the Pigworm has not found a Date yet. But one fateful day on a stroll through the neighbouring park, Piggles has some wonderful encounters. Will you help true love strike or is Piggles doomed to stay alone forever?

Find your Match!

In classic Dating Sim fashion, you can help Piggles charm or repulse different characters, but there's a catch! As Piggles is a common Pigworm, his adventure takes place in the ground ... You cannot see their face until they agree to a date!

Falling in digital love has never been this pure and deep. Start your adventure now in a round of literal blind dating!

Please note that this game contains images that may be disturbing to some. Proceed with caution.

CW : Death, Abuse, Animal Cruelty

This Game was created during the Global Game Jam 2023.

Contributors:

Philip (hololol1)- Game Development

Romina - Narrative Design & Dialogue Writing

Chase (Maultaschenprinz) - Queen Prunus Aviam Graphics, Backgrounds, Dateillustrations

János (OrangeStone) - Professor Pinus Graphics

Marlena (Pflughoernchen) - Betula Pendula & Piggles Graphics, Emote Overlays

Marvin (cyanine)- Game Development, UI, SoundDesign

Malika (mingapur) - Park Map illustration
